metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2244 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in lib/conditionlib.phpin Moodle 2.4.x before 2.4.5 and 2.5.x before 2.5.1 allow remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the conditional access rulevalue of a user field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
